topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
So my cosplay is coming together still

I had the shirt, shorts, and socks for Tyrone already in my wardrobe, but I just got the shoes delivered today, and now I'm waiting on the hat and vest to arrive. The hat should be here by the end of the week, but the vest isn't supposed to get here until the 27th _at the earliest,_ so I'm a bit worried :/

Guy on the left btw in case anyone wanted a basis to see what it would look like, because Dipper is overdone :P
!http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/gravityfalls/images/7/7f/S1e7_dipper_and_tyrone_in_attic.png/revision/20140524110829!
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
